posts.post_content:
Can anyone direct me to collector-grade (VG-ish) of the 4 following Cubbies?!?!?!
Thomas Leach
Arthur Phelan
Frank Schulte
Vic Saier

Good Registration and contrast are most important, fewer creases the better, and backs are not important...
let me know what you may have for sale!!

Thanks,
Jason

posts.post_title: Bump,...Still Looking for these 4 T222 Cubs
posts.post_content:
Anyone have any for sale?
I would love to finish this team set this year!

Thanks!
Jason L

I know this is a quick bump but I was wondering if anyone has seen any population studies on the T222s?
I wanted to collect the 8 card Cubs team set this year and i very quickly uncovered 4 of them within a month or two, but a selection of the remaining four hasn't come up since!

Can anyone share some info on this set's scarcity?

Thanks!
Jason
